channel.title: [Not so-Lore suggestion] Planterror the Poacher's Self Imposed Exile
channel.description:
*We found a note in Planterror's room. He seemed to have took his valuables and ran out of the castle. Guards are still looking for his whereabouts. The note reads:*
"Hey all.
I want to get something straight before I begin. I love the community here on discord, and on the forums. But I think it's time I left and here's why.
First reason: I can't take much more salt. I'm sick of game after game of throwing or stupidity or even some harrassment once in a while. I understand that that's part of a community but anything salty happens to me just about every other game.
Second reason: I need a break. Everyone needs this once in a while, you play a game that's fun, and once you get bored of it, you move on. I have over 300 hours on this game and I love almost everything about it. But I think it's time to move on.
Third reason: Internal issues. Right as it stands, I'm too much on the video games. Not to mention the other countless reasons I need to work out first before I come back.
Who knows, I might return soon. But as it stands right now I need to quit.
I'm gonna miss you all. I might still be on the forums once in a while.
-Planterror"
*After inspecting the room it has shown traces of unseen and spike traps everywhere. He was confirmed to be a poacher. The guards have decided wait for him to return and imprison him for treason.*

item.title: [Not so-Lore suggestion] Planterror the Poacher's Self Imposed Exile
item.dc:creator: Planterror
item.description:
Thanksgiving weekend, gonna cheat a little bit. see you all on here.

if my game ever downloads that would be great thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [Not so-Lore suggestion] Planterror the Poacher's Self Imposed Exile
item.dc:creator: Planterror
item.description:
We found a note in Planterror’s room. He seemed to have took his valuables and ran out of the castle. Guards are still looking for his whereabouts. The note reads:

"Hey all.

I want to get something straight before I begin. I love the community here on discord, and on the forums. But I think it’s time I left and here’s why.

First reason: I can’t take much more salt. I’m sick of game after game of throwing or stupidity or even some harrassment once in a while. I understand that that’s part of a community but anything salty happens to me just about every other game.

Second reason: I need a break. Everyone needs this once in a while, you play a game that’s fun, and once you get bored of it, you move on. I have over 300 hours on this game and I love almost everything about it. But I think it’s time to move on.

Third reason: Internal issues. Right as it stands, I’m too much on the video games. Not to mention the other countless reasons I need to work out first before I come back.

Who knows, I might return soon. But as it stands right now I need to quit.

I’m gonna miss you all. I might still be on the forums once in a while.

-Planterror"

After inspecting the room it has shown traces of unseen and spike traps everywhere. He was confirmed to be a poacher. The guards have decided wait for him to return and imprison him for treason.
